headline: ServiceNow (NOW) CEO McDermott Bought $3 Million Worth Company Shares, Here’s What You Need to Know
summary: ​ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the Best Dip Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On February 17, Barron’s reported that ServiceNow, Inc.’s (NYSE:NOW) CEO William “Bill” McDermott bought $3 million worth of company shares on the open market. ​This move comes as the “SaaSpocalypse” narrative has overtaken Wall Street and has dragged the […]

headline: Tequity Advisors Welcomes Thomas Moewe as ServiceNow Leader, M&A Advisor
summary: Tequity Advisors, a leading sell-side M&A advisory firm focused on B2B Enterprise Cloud, SaaS, and technology-enabled services companies, today announced the appointment of Thomas Moewe as ServiceNow Leader, M&A Advisor.

headline: Rimini Street: Cheap Valuation Meets Record RPO And Agentic AI Bridge
